ooC: I read the post, but I'm entirely sure what's happened to 
Megatron, so I'll try posting and see what comes out of it.

-- Megatron / Switchblade --

"Grrr" growls Megatron as Owlhawk continues to get a shot off at 
him. Not wanting to be hit by the Vok Destroyer shot, he puts all of 
his efforts into diving to the side, out of the way. 

The powerful weaponshot warps the surrounding air as it flashes by 
Megatron's lower legs. His circuits tingle as he realizes what had 
missed him.

He hits the ground sliding, but quickly rolls, and brings himself 
into a crouching position. His should armour still damaged from 
Owlhawk's initial attack, was the only damaged part on him at the 
moment. Seeing the Tripredacus retreating, he growls at missing the 
chance to eliminate a few slag heaps. "Crushing something... 
Maximalish would be nice right now... yesss..."

New faces on the field greated his eyes. One could be none other 
than Galvatron, who was fighting the Maximal leader, Rodimus 
Prime. "A situation to be taken advantage of." He smiles menacingly; 
evil amusement could be read from his glowing red optics.

---------------------

Meanwhile, Switchblade has been fooling around with the artifact 
he'd just put together, or more correctly, put itself together for 
him. He probes it's sides for any sort of start mechanism.

Searching without any lucky, he was about to quit, when the cube-
like matrix of artifact suddenly started to glow. He found that he 
couldn't remove his hands from the sides that he was holding, and he 
had no idea what was happening.

Suddenly, a white superheated blade of white spears outward, slicing 
through the side of the storage bay and slashing across the western 
battle field (west side of the Pred base) causing massive damage to 
anything in it's path. Switchblade was still gripping the artifact 
like there was no tomorrow, and he didn't appear to be fully 
concious. It was like the artifact was controlling him.

( i just chose a side for the attack to damage, so if anyone feels 
that there bot is on the west side, they can post for the attack 
damaging their bots, or missing them. I intend to have Megatron 
damaged at a minimum. =) )
